name: requtize/assetter
description: Assets manager for PHP. Allow manage CSS and JS files in website and its dependencies. Also allows refresh cache in browsers by adding revisions of loaded files.

suggest.leafo/scssphp: Allows write styles in SASS and compile files directly to CSS just-in-time.
suggest.leafo/lessphp: Allows write styles in LESS and compile files directly to CSS just-in-time.
